name: Frogger - Learning Project
description:
Frogger - A Learning Project

This a learning project clone of the popular game Frogger from 1981.

This project was created with a time frame of 5 days (20 hs) to improve my begining game dev skills.

I try to replicate most of the basic mechanincs of the game as a first level / demo. There were other things to be implemented as the bonus bug you can cath and earn more point, or the the hazzard of the turtles diving into water. But because I have no more time for this project I need to leave behind these features.

Hope you enjoy this mini game project and if you like leave me feedback of your experience with it.

;)
